revised_title: Isotope Effects in the Nuclear Charge Distribution in Zinc: A Comprehensive Study
tldr: This article investigates the isotope effects in the nuclear charge distribution of zinc using optical isotope shifts, electron scattering, muonic isotope shifts, and Coulomb excitation experiments. The results provide insights into the variations in the nuclear charge distribution due to adding neutrons and help test nuclear models and understand the nuclear deformation of zinc isotopes.
